name: we_project
description: - Install all the dependencies: `npm i` - Build and run at the localhost PORT=3000: `npm start` - Login Credential `username:password`     - user: `user:user`     - admin: `admin:admin`

scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.setup: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ..
scripts.build-run: cd client && npm run build && cd .. && node server.js
